# target

**Instance Property**

The menu item’s target.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var target: AnyObject? { get set }
```

## Discussion

To ensure that a menu item’s target can receive commands while a modal dialog is open, the target object should return [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPanel/worksWhenModal].

## Managing the target and action

- **action**: The menu item’s action-method selector.
